#summary Setup your Tropo app.

  # Go to the [http://tropo.com Tropo home page]
  # Signup for a free account and create a new app.
  # For the entry point, use `http://MY_APPP.spot.com` where `MY_APP` is the name of your App Engine project.
  # Tell Tropo to assign a phone number to your app.
  # Use this phone number for the value of `PRETTY_APP_PHONE` in `app/my_globals.py`
